headline: Sanitation Truck, Concrete Mixer and Bus Kill 3 Pedestrians in Separate Crashes
abstract: One of those struck was a 10-year-old boy. The fatalities brought the pedestrian death toll to four in the new year.
lead_paragraph: A 10-year-old boy and a 68-year-old woman were fatally struck by trucks in separate crashes on Tuesday, the third and fourth pedestrians to be killed by vehicles on New York streets in the first week of the new year, officials said.
